name: Xtreme Snow Bike Rider
description:
Xtreme Snow Bike Rider is fun, challenging and will test your patience for sure! Ride through some challenging levels, under extreme weather conditions. Each level of Xtreme Snow Bike Rider is more thrilling than the previous level. Ride carefully through the dark night, in foggy weather and thundering rain.

Show your skills in Xtreme Snow Bike Rider. Experience the exhilarating action!

FEATURES:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Dangerous hilly roads
- Smooth and realistic bike handling
- Realistic game sounds
- Simulator like controls
- Easy to learn and drive
- Enjoy cool background music
